game.name: Easy Bake Cookies
game.description:
It is always exciting and interesting to bake delicious recipes for Gwen. These days, more and more people love to visit her place in a search for the extremely scrumptious cookies that she really bakes nicely. Are you ready to this chance to help this cute girl bake more cookies for her guests? Also decorate the cookies jar with the help of your creative skills. The process of preparing these delicious desserts is quite simple and easy. 

Follow all the useful instructions to accomplish your goal in this brand new free online cooking game for girls. One of the most important reasons why she wants your help is since she has not tried out this recipe yet and pretty confused how to go further. This beautiful girl trusts on your chef skills to prepare some mouth-watering treats. Let start it with collecting the needful kitchen utensils and ingredients. 

Take a bowl and mix some baking soda, sugar and flour into it. Also mix the eggs, butter and milk in another bowl. Take these two mixtures and blend them perfectly in order to obtain the batter for your cookies. Use a rolling pin to roll the dough and place it in a tray and put it in a freeze to cool it down. Use several types of jams to prepare the sauce then and spread it on your cookie dough. Place the dough in the freezer again after rolling it up. Slice them into pieces and bake them in the oven. Meanwhile, decorate your cookie jar. Your bake cookies are ready now to be served.
